Author: Lois
Title: i like this product
Body: I am changing my original review. The back brakes do in fact work, but the first time you lock them, it is hard to do. Once you get them to lock that first time, it becomes easier to lock in place with your foot.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Beth Hopkins
Title: Great value!
Body: Stroller is priced right and is a great value! I’m tall (5’10”) and don’t have to hunch down and it’s easy to push! Highly recommend!
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Ryan
Title: Doesn’t close easy. Baby is not comfortable.
Body: Very stiff. Baby is not comfortable. Does not fold easily.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: yshwnth
Title: Doesn’t close completely
Body: Poor finish, can’t fold it to compact design. We missed our flight working on this stroller. Looks cheap and poor quality materials
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Linds
Title: Don’t buy
Body: I would return this if I still had the box . Now it’s just too much of a hassle to go find a box this big and return this. This definitely cannot be unfolded with one hand, in fact I have difficulty when using both hands to unfold. States use for up to 50 pounds, My daughter is 29 pounds and too big for this. Her feet hang off almost hitting the ground when pushed
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: mysalter
Title: its simple and light
Body: its simple and light. easy to use
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Nancy Deemer
Title: Lightweight
Body: Found just the stroller I was looking for. Very lightweight but does not tip over like an umbrella stroller. Easy to fold and carry while getting off and on Disney buses. Hood provides shade. They snack table is a welcome addition.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Abigail
Title: Perfect for a day out!
Body: This stroller is perfect for walks on even terrain and for days out with your child. It is small and maneuvers really well. We were putting up with using a giant jogging stroller for all of our walks and outings until we got this little stroller. It was a serious upgrade! It is small enough to fit in the closet by our front door but also big enough to hold a very full diaper bag in the lower compartment. We have used this for 7 months and it has held up well. Also very easy to put together.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Alexa terry
Title: Love this stroller
Body: Super easy to fold up. It’s lightweight and convenient. Worth the money.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: AmazonBuyer
Title: 7 pieces - no instructions
Body: Product arrived in 7 pieces with no instructions!
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Alex vieyra
Title: As described
Body: Bought it for a travel stroller a it’s lightweight.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Tania
Title: Good for granny’s house
Body: Box came missing 1 washer and the pins to attach wheels. I ended up buying them at the hardware store and now it works. Wheels are hard plastic instead of rubber, but it’s probably okay for occasional use when granddaughter is visiting.Star removed for missing hardware and plastic wheels.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Victory
Title: Wheels never stay on & break instantly
Body: Wheels never stay on & break instantly.I returned first stroller for same wheel issue that almost caused serious damage & this stroller is dangerous they should be out of business!!! I returned the stroller and got a new one which does the same issue! The wheels never click into place no matter how hard you push abs they just fly off anytime anywhere. Returning this garbage asap
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: KT
Title: Great travel stroller!
Body: Love how light this product is. It was easy to put together and has great steering. My 1 y/o fits in very comfortably with room to spare. I enjoy the features like the recline, the toddler tray, and storage basket below.Only thing I don’t love is that the latch to keep the stroller folded is pretty pointless. It unlatches very easily so this will not keep it closed when travel on a plane. I will need to make a strap to keep it closed.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: CARLOS JOSE DE MATOS JUNIOR
Title: Arrive broken
Body: look at the difference on one side. one side completely broken. the item looks used I do not recommend
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: GP
Title: Terribly cheap
Body: Cannot adjust angle on back support so baby cannot sit up straight. One skinny strap across the front between babys legsBaby hate stroller!!!Would not recommend!!!
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Pebbz
Title: Disappointing
Body: Bulit the shroller and went to adjust the harness and it ripped so easily when I adjusted the strap on right side of harness. Was hoping to be able to use it this weekend for my baby. Very dissapointing.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Swaroop
Title: Rugged and long lasting
Body: Bought this for kid 1 so we could easily travel internationally. This is easy to gate check at airplane entry. Fast forward 7 years now we use it for kid2 for walks and parks. Over these years we have folded into car trunks and unfolded hundreds of times. It has been strolled on side walks, beaches, trails. Still looks new. None of the joints have came loose and cosmetically the finish looks pretty new. Great value.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Cynthia Mercer
Title: Not worth price!
Body: Too much assembly required. Directions not clear. Parent tray only fits sideways, so not useful. Cheap quality.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: southerngal
Title: Well-made and easy to assemble w clear instructions
Body: Very well-packed w clear instructions for assembly. I’m a grandmother and did it myself in 20 minutes. Has sizable storage area plus is sturdy, yet lightweight to lift if needed. Kid tray for drink cup, etc. and 2 parent cup holders. Mesh see-through area for the stroller canopy, too.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Megan Arnold
Title: Great for the price
Body: We bought this for a trip since our normal stroller is so big. This was easy to put together but my biggest issue is that when it’s folded up the basket under the seat drags on the ground and the wheels block each other from rolling. Which was kinda the point of getting a compact stroller. But honestly it’s $70 and I’m not upset if it gets damage.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Heather
Title: This stroller has it all!
Body: I needed a stroller with extra storage space but also light weight enough to carry on and off buses at the amusement parks. Instructions were simple to read and assembled in minutes. Very light weight and easy to fold with one hand. Also love that extra storage space at the bottom.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Frances H.
Title: Definitely not that great
Body: Liked that is pretty Light weight, hate that cup holder is so small and seat won’t stay up, not place to rest babies feet, stroller is not what I thought it would be, I wouldn’t recommend this stroller to anyone.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Janieka Johnson
Title: Very difficult to put together doesn’t come partly assembled either
Body: Very difficult to put together
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: GeeGee
Title: How sturdy it is
Body: I love that it’s easy to clean and fold. I would recommend for anyone that need cup holders as well purchasing a few items from a store. Thank you! ❤️
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Christianne
Title: Red stroller
Body: Smaller then I thought it would be
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Mia
Title: Not great
Body: This stroller is a hassle. It does not turn properly. It also gets stuck at times when folding.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Easy to fold and lightweight
Body: As a grandmother, I didn’t need a heavy duty stroller. This one is perfect to pack for running errands or taking leisurely strolls. The only downfall is there’s no middle bar between the child’s legs, so it’s easy for a small child to slip out if not fully strapped in.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Magdaline Tate
Title: Safety
Body: Like the size bought for my grandbaby
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: MD JAHIDUL ISLAM
Title: Look like pretty. Too much light. But it's not a heavy strong product
Body: Look like pretty. Too much light. But it's not a heavy strong product
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Emily
Title: Light weight and portable
Body: Great for on the go. I have a Graco stroller which is super heavy, but maneuvers much easier. This one sometimes seems to want to steer a different direction (may be just due to it being so light weight). I also feel like if at a park or somewhere outdoors, it’s not as smooth of a ride. You can definitely feel rolling over pebbles or sticks a lot. Also we do not find it to be a “one-handed folding” stroller. It’s kind of a pain to unfold. The cup holders at the top for parents are also really small—it will fit a water bottle but not my travel coffee mug—and the tray barely fits my phone. Overall, decent value for the price and again, it accomplishes the job of being a portable stroller for quick trips to the grocery store or mall. The baby seems comfortable, too.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Lauren Jackson
Title: Not my favorite
Body: I wish u would have chose a different stroller! The string points on this one are… the tray for baby, the cup holders for parents, large basket underneath, and it’s very light weight! The bad outweighs the good for me though! It’s very cheap and flimsy, the cup holder for my son is small and won’t fit his cup, cheap straps, and no support when sitting! It’s literally one step above a 20 dollar umbrella stroller! Save yourself and choose wiser than I did!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Susan Brown
Title: Very limited appeal
Body: Bought this for the grandkid’s visit. It was just ok. You get what you pay for, but this was so hard to maneuver that I might have been better off with a $25 umbrella stroller.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Mariana Leon
Title: Straps not adjustable…
Body: For some reason, my husband and I could not figure out how to loosen the straps so our daughter was more comfortable. We ended up just getting a new stroller. But I liked that it had a cup holder and table for her and a cup holder for me.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: edlira
Title: This stroller is everything
Body: Someone took it when I left it in front of our house. I used this so much, everyday, its so light and easy to use, its perfect. My toddler would sleep in it, it does not recline much but enough that she would get one or two hours of sleep. The only thing is, I hated the color, dont get the red, did not fade or anything but I should have gotten the grey, goes better with everything.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: s*mac123
Title: Feels cheap
Body: It is a nice enough stroller, but the price point is too high for what you get.Pros:Folds up compactlyLightweightCons:Hard to maneuverFeels cheaply madeCup holders won’t hold anything larger than a standard 16 oz water bottleI sold this one and went with another brand. But if compact and lightweight are your two top concerns this might work for you.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: brenda powell
Title: Perfect
Body: Easy to use!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: B
Title: Perfect!
Body: Perfect size and weight for our upcoming trip, our son already loves it! He says its real comfy! Great storage underneath!
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kylie V
Title: Simple and small
Body: You definitely get what you pay for. Good quality. I’d say I wish the cup holders were slightly bigger and I wish the storage part underneath was bigger as well but it’s a small stroller and works well for us.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Elaine S. MacK
Title: Easy Peasy
Body: This is the best stroller. Extremely lightweight and easy to close. My 2 year old grand loves it. The only thing that would have made it better would have been an option for an extended handle.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Key harris
Title: Amazing
Body: I love it perfect size for short women 410 of height💯✅
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Paul R.
Title: Great customer support
Body: My stroller stop folding after a few uses. I contacted the company and after exchanging emails they sent me a new one free of charge including shipping.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Mel
Title: Great buy!
Body: I bought this stroller to keep at my house for our grandson. It is lightweight, easy to fold, or unfold. It reclines but not flat and that is okay. Perfect for us to use and has cup holders for baby and the person pushing, ample storage below.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: RRice
Title: Wheel broke the first time I used it and my child almost got hurt.
Body: Very disappointed in this item. I ordered it for affordability and light weight. Put it together (easy assembly) and the first time I used it got caught in the rain with a broken wheel. The wheel popped off while I was crossing the street and I had to basically carry the stroller and my toddler the remaining five blocks I was walking. I eventually retraced my steps and found the piece that had popped off and reassembled it once more but the same thing happened a week later when I was walking to work, this time the piece was not found and I had to use paper clips to hold both wheels on. Very disappointed in how dangerous and rickety the stroller is and since I do not have the packaging, can't send it back. I would like to request a refund.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sikira
Title: Great condition
Body: Perfect everything came with it and great condition
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Stephanie Mister
Title: Stroller was really easy to assemble
Body:
The media could not be loaded.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  
   Light weight easy to follow instructions. Perfect size for five month old.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: AMKo
Title: NOT the best stroller for Disney World
Body: I purchased this stroller after reading tons of reviews and articles about the “best” stroller for Walt Disney World. It is lightweight and easy to collapse and it is definitely a good option if you’re only interested in those qualities. For your child’s comfort and overall park experience, this is NOT the stroller you want. My sister and I went together, she took her Vista and I took this. Big mistake! There is just no comparing the two. I totally got what I paid for and what I was looking for (ease of use around the park) but that is it. I would not take it to a park or event again. My son hated it and refused to stay in it. It is also very difficult to steer and maneuver. It’s getting donated, to sum up my experience.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amber
Title: Great for traveling with a little one
Body: Bought this stroller to take on vacation and was well worth the purchase. Going through the airport was also easy to manuver. It folds up so nicely. Would highly recommend for traveling!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Joan Smith
Title: Excellent
Body: This stroller is perfection!! Quality, durable, lightweight, fits in trunk easily. Very comfortable for baby. I purchased for my great grandson’s visit here in Florida. It was perfect for our day trips. They happily took it home to New York.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: no name
Title: Very difficult to fold and store.
Body: Would not buy again. Shallow seat. What a pain this is to fold up! I literally hate this stroller. I wish I had used it more sooner so I could have returned. I kept thinking I would get the hang of it. Geese I hate this thing!!!! Did I mention I hate this stroller?
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Nicholas
Title: Decent for the price!
Body: Nice for travel, lightweight and durable enough to withstand daily use.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great, inexpensive travel stroller
Body: We purchased for using at the airport- love how easy it was to assemble, and that it’s lightweight, has great maneuverability, and folds easily. Not really a one handed fold, but maybe I just didn’t practice enough! I’d recommend for traveling. Seems like great quality as well, especially at this price!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Brianna
Title: Wouldn’t recommend
Body: To short for tall people to push
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: krista anderson
Title: Serves it purpose
Body: Not easy to fold. Nice stroller,alittle pricey for quality.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: CMol
Title: Light weight and worth the price
Body: Light weight and perfect size for our trip and her car seat(gracosnuglite35) just so happens to fit as well. Definitely takes a few try’s to close it up. Overall we’re happy to have a lightweight stroller for our trip that didn’t break the bank to buy.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Milly
Title: Un éxito para viajar
Body: Cómodo, liviano, fácil de cerrar. Nos ha encantado.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Ihtisham Thakur
Title: Its suppose to be east assemble and just wheels fixing but it came damage
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Rick F
Title: Decent, but missing a part UPDATE
Body: Update: Reached out to the company customer service and they sent me the replacement parts free and fast! It’s definitely a travel stroller quality, not for daily wear-and-tear, but we love it! Would buy again!Seems like a sturdy stroller upon assembly so far. Missing one pin for the wheel and the parent tray, so I’ve reached out to customer service for a replacement. Will update with experience.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Carol
Title: Sweet Stroller
Body: The folding is a bit misleading not quite as quick or easy... However, great stroller for quick errands, neighborhood walks or visits to parks, zoo or museums. Compact and easy to navigate without hogging all the space like some other strollers. Yes, I would purchase again!!!!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: tania
Title: Perfect for keeping in the house
Body: I have a Nunavut and it's awesome and convenient but it's a pain at times putting the carseat or other attachments on. This is lightweight and easy to keep in the house for walks and keep inside the house. My 9 month old loves it such a great 2nd step stroller
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sarah Guerrettaz
Title: Okay for the Price
Body: Pros:- relatively inexpensive- lightweight- snack tray (my son loves it but has a hard time reaching it with how reclined the seat is)Cons:- not very maneuverable / difficult to steer- difficult to fold and doesn't latch well- parent cup holders are way too small and shallow and don't have any adjustability- parent tray sits right under the main handle which really limits how much it can hold
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Victoria Roa
Title: Great find affordable price
Body: It met the expectations although it is more difficult to fold and unfold than expected. I wish it had more reclining options. Otherwise, is a great option for a robust, low value good quality stroller. I used it for a trip and it met all the expectations.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sue
Title: Folding is NOT one handed
Body: I'm not at all thrilled with this purchase. I thought I'd pay a little more and get a better quality product, but this just feels cheap. The wheels are plastic and cheap. If you're a body builder, the one handed folding(which was a big selling point for me) may work for you, but for me it only works with two hands and when you do finally get it to fold, the tires get in the way, so you have to use your hands to get them in the right position. What ever happened to the well made, easy umbrella stroller?? Ugh
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Bethany P
Title: The perks of a regular stroller and also an umbrella stroller
Body: I bought this many many years ago for my son because I wanted an umbrella stroller to avoid having to lug around a heavier full-size stroller. I went with this because it had all of the perks that regular strollers have that umbrella strollers don’t. It’s very lightweight and folds down much much smaller than traditional strollers. I loved the tray for snacks on the go and also having a bottom storage area, although both were much smaller compared to other strollers. The wheels were about to be expected for a cheaper stroller though, we still got a lot of use out of it.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Melissa
Title: after less than 6 months, it won't close
Body: I had high hopes for this stroller, and it did serve it's purpose to go to disney and be light weight, fold super small so we could gate check it (just recommend getting a gate check bag so you don't lose the child tray) and it has amazing amounts of storage. But after a routine trip to the mall, it won't fold up no matter what I do. I'm hoping it was a fluke on just our stroller, because it really has held up well, but man I was upset.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: PAUL MCCLINTOCK
Title: Very usable
Body: As expected
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Courtney Price
Title: Just right
Body: I was looking for some thing that wasn’t too short in the handles that was lightweight sturdy easy to fold in. This product is amazing. Didn’t take long to put some of the parts on
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Helen
Title: Not fit for the baby
Body: I don’t like this stroller at all. I wish I could return it, but unfortunately when you install it, it’s one time snap only, which means there’s NO WAY you can take it off. Then you couldn’t pack it into the original box. So there’s no way you could return it.The main reason I want to return it, it’s because it doesn’t fit for the baby who less than 1 years old. Baby CANNOT lay down in the stroller. It’s for sitting ONLY. I hope that it could make it clearer in the product description, especially it should tell the user how many degrees when the seat could lay down.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Alyssa
Title: Great but one flaw!
Body: Lightweight and super easy to use. BUT as soon as you unbuckle your child, they will slide right out of the bottom if you aren't careful!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: M klein
Title: Not worth the hype
Body: Was hoping to use this it for an upcoming trip but it is not going to be worth the headache. Did a test drive through a busy mall today it did not provide positive thoughts. Sterling is not ideal and the fold button is tricky and is not one handed. Returning soon.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: ANDREA G.
Title: I wouldn't buy it again
Body: I bought this one because I was looking for something practical, easy and light weighted. It's pretty light however it does not maneuver if you are not with your 2 hands on it. Not practical at all! Not super easy to fold as well. And the worst for me is that the child is super exposed to the sun! I wish I had paid more for something much better.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Elizabeth Bohlen
Title: Easy peasy!
Body: I am a grandmother that needed a light weight and easy to fold stroller to keep in the back of my SUV. This one is perfect!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sarah F
Title: Just what I needed
Body: Now I haven't used the stroller with my baby I'm it yet since it just arrived today so I may update my review but after assembly this stroller seems to be exactly what I need. It is lightweight, folds up nicely so I can keep it in my car, has a tray and storage basket. The only complaint I have after opening is I noticed a few small holes in the hood like something pierced it while it was folded up.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kristina L. Davis
Title: Completely damaged box
Body: I’m SO livid. It seems like it was a return that I received in a completely obliterated box. Needless to say I am returning!!!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Alyssa
Title: Stroller works
Body: Very lightweight and easy to assemble and fold. My only problem is that it's not as padded for my child as I'd like it to be.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Mrs Vampiress
Title: Love it
Body: Great
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Megan Asel
Title: The stroller was just okay
Body: I was really excited to try this product. It was really easy to build and I like how it folds. However there are these I dislike about it. The stroller is not so east to maneuver and my baby can feel every pump in the sidewalk. I am assuming this stroller is only good for malls, stores and airports. It doesn’t do well on sidewalks. It’s shakes so much when it goes over pumps or debri on the sidewalk. I also really disliked that you can’t cover the peek hole with mesh on the top of the stroller. I was out walking with my Diet Coke in the cup holder and we went over a pump and some of it spilled. It right through the uncover peek hole and on to my babies head. Very dissatisfied.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Nicole
Title: Buy cheap get cheap
Body: You get what you pay for. Bought it as a travel stroller. Fell apart after a weeks worth of use
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Asia
Title: Good buy
Body: This is my favorite stroller, it is easy to fold & store away. Also is lightweight & easy to travel with in the airport etc.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kitty
Title: Great stroller
Body: Great stroller for Disney, lightweight, and easy to fold up.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Nicole
Title: This is the stroller you’ve been searching for!!
Body: Let me start off by saying I have absolutely zero patience for strollers that require certain steps to open/collapse. I’ve gone through 3 different ones all different price ranges. I wanted one with more seat support than what most easy fold strollers have and this is IT! I also was searching for one with the cup holders infront. This is an amazing price for it being everything I’ve been looking for. Lightweight, easy to maneuver, appealing to the eye, and my 7 month old doesn’t mind it! There is not one thing on this stroller I don’t like. Not cheaply made, very sturdy.I wish I would’ve bought this sooner!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Have to pull cup holder off everytime you take child out
Body: What I don't like is you have to pull off the cup holder everytime my granddaughter has to be removed instead of flipping it over. When closing up the storage below drags while trying to pull it around.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sash L
Title: A must have for travel purposes
Body: I got this for vacation and it was a win. Light weight and easy to move around.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Steven C. French
Title: Sometimes it won’t collapse
Body: Trouble collapsing it which caused me to shove it on car , I almost just left it on sidewalk because I didn’t have room for it in car
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sab
Title: Just okay
Body: I would say that for the price it's okay but I have the feeling that I will struggle to use it. The one hand folding is not true. I had to put the wheel in the right direction in order to have it fold normally. So 2 hands with no kids running around are needed. The suspension is not real. It's just a piece a plastic that covers a rigit metal frame. The wheel are cheaply made. I don't think that will resist long for who is using that stroller on a daily basis. Great fit for a Light usage.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Liz
Title: Item is light weight
Body: I dislike the fact that it doesn't close as easy as it shows
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Charlotte
Title: I wish I found this sooner!
Body: The stroller is very light, has a lot of room, moves well, and pretty easy to fold once you get the hang of it. The back comes down so your child can kind of recline in it. My son has actually fallen asleep in this stroller! Love it.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: RD
Title: JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR!!
Body: I purchased this stroller for my granddaughter and it is awesome. To be honest, sometimes she does not want to get out of it lol. Very happy with my purchase.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Janelle
Title: Perfect for trqvel
Body: So easy to use at airports. One handed fold easy to do at the gate of plane.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: geovy
Title: This stroller is not for everyone
Body: I purchased the stroller because It had a lot of good reviews, also because there were some comments that it was good for a four-year-old despite a picture, I saw of a four year old practically not being able to fit in the stroller. I still went tablead and purchased it. The stroller is not good for me it was very difficult to maneuver hard to go through bumps. My child is practically dangling off the stroller the piece to put the feet is too small, barely reclines, throughout, our trip rained and the peace to cover had an open slot where my daughter was getting wet. It did have some positive things like it was lightweight and easy to close, however the stroller being lightweight. It’s probably the reason it’s so hard to maneuver the wheels kept getting stuck.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amanda Chattin
Title: Good for price
Body: Not bad, overall pleased. Frustrated that cupholders aren’t bigger.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kacie
Title: Its fine
Body: It works, has good under storage... but it squeaks like crazy. Horrible squeaking. And I cannot fix it. Unfortunately my son also hates the loud squeaking so ill probably have to get a new stroller even though it's fine otherwise.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Elizabeth Davis
Title: Nice but cheap
Body: I would say this is worth less than it's listed for. We bought it for a trip and I thought it was nice that it had the cup holders and under storage. The under storage is pretty small and it can be hard to maneuver. Other than that, it's fine if you don't care much about that! It did the job but I just feel like wasn't worth $70
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Ms. Dell
Title: Happy Mom Happy Baby
Body: I purchased this for my great grandson and his mother loves it. It does and it is everything as described. We are all satisfied with it.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Joan Aliperti
Title: You get what you pay for 🙄
Body: Spend a little more and get better quality
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Makram
Title: Works until it doesnt
Body: Had to get rid of these after a while.The folding mechanism was the first to fail. Then it became harder and harder to use.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Liz
Title: Hard to fold
Body: Please do not buy this. The folding mechanism is not user friendly. Two of us had to fold and unfold the stroller. It was unbelievably hard. Biggest mistake. Besides that, it was easy to navigate through a crowd very light weight. If it was easy to fold and unfold it would be the perfect stroller for the price.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sara G.
Title: Hard to steer
Body: We were excited to be gifted this stroller as we wanted something lightweight now that our son is a toddler. Unfortunately, it seems anytime we get to a smooth surface, like tile, we can’t steer it at all and it is very difficult to maneuver. Based on other reviews, I don’t know if we just have a faulty stroller or what, but we are very disappointed.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kathryn Edward
Title: Very easy to handle!!
Body: I bought this for my grandson and use it all of the time. It’s very easy to handle and lightweight.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Renee Scott
Title: Cheap
Body: It is cheap over priced hard to open and hard to take down. Not a smooth ride Buyer be Where !
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Zee
Title: Great for on the go
Body: Very light and easy to open. Struggle to close because of the wheels but got the hang of it. Love to take this with for shopping when we are in and out of the car or if I’m by myself I don’t have to struggle to get the stroller out. Highly recommend!
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: bluechocolate
Title: Wobbly front wheels
Body: Bought it a few days ago and the stroller was super easy to assemble. However, the front wheels wobble and swapping them around or re-adjusting them hasn't helped so we'll likely be returning it.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: etai cohen
Title: Good value for money
Body: Not really one hand fold
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Maria Veronica Sy-Rondaris
Title: Kolcraft lightweight toddler stroller
Body: It came super fast. Easy to assemble. Pretty small and good to use for traveling. Super lightweight. The only issue is it came with a white stain near the canopy. Not sure if the manufacturer able to send replacement for the canopy. The white stain cannot be remove somehow. Hoping they can because it super visible in the eye and it doesn't look nice at all.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Alex Luckasevic
Title: Disney Toddler Must Have!
Body: We have a two year old and made the trip to Disney! His other stroller lasted us two long years, but it was not an easy one to travel with… after seeing the price for renting a stroller in the parks, we ordered this one. AMAZING! Perfect size for a toddler. I don’t think it would be great for a smaller kiddo, but perfect for a 2-3 year old. Folds easily, super lightweight, and comfy! I can’t believe the quality for the price.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Brittany Greene
Title: Light weight stroller
Body: Light weight easy to handle and store for any outings with the little one
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kristina
Title: Perfect for my chunk
Body: Smaller than a jogging stroller but bigger than an umbrella stroller! Perfect for my chunky babe!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: sohany flores
Title: Excellent purchase
Body: Easy to habdle
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Scott W.
Title: lightweight
Body: Easy to assemble Have not used yet but I think it is great for the money
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Carrie L. Mays
Title: Nice Stroller
Body: Easy to assemble and very lightweight. Wheels are hard plastic and there's a sort of cheap feel to it which is why I didn't give it five stars overall. It does the job so far though.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: knox
Title: Missing a part
Body: I can't store anything in it because the storage basket can't be use since it's missing a part, umm it's really light weight, the brakes doesn't hold at all, I don't have a choice really since returning isn't an option
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Jacquie
Title: Missing parts
Body: Missing one of two front wheel parts.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: michelle reardon
Title: Not happy
Body: I feel like the stroller is flimsy versus light weight. The cup holders are smaller than most cups that toddlers use. Disappointed.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kathleen J.
Title: Love love love
Body: This stroller has a higher weight limit then most and will last me years. That was my selling point. The price is also amazing for the quality and specs of the stroller. The light color makes sure my little guy doesn't bake in the sun and he runs hot and loves playing.This thing glides over everything except grass which was expected. It fits in most store aisles with ease and little bumping of the shelf's.The only things I think could be improved is a leg divider to make it harder for my little guy to drop out of the bottom and run from me. He hates being restrainted into the stroller with the harness, he will fuss and meltdown.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Meagan
Title: Must have
Body: I'm on baby number 5 and this is by far the best stroller I've bought. Easy to put together and durable and sturdy. Easy to maneuver and easy folding
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Jennifer R Heuertz
Title: Nice lightweight stroller
Body: I had been using a different umbrella stroller that was a real hassle to collapse, didn't store upright, and was kind of heavy. I wanted something lightweight, easy to collapse, and that folded flat, but stood up so I didn't have to bend down to get it. This stroller definitely fits the bill! It's very light, and while it takes a bit of finesse with the latch on the handle, it collapses with one hand. It will then stand upright and folded, and takes up less space. It has a tray, which is really great, and has come in handy a lot, but the bummer is that it doesn't come off. It does have a reclining seat, but at it's tightest, it is still fairly tilted back, so my son is never quite upright. He doesn't seem to mind most of the time. The storage basket is a decent size, and there are two cupholders and a phone holder in the handle, as well as a cupholder in the tray. The padding is already starting to tear on the handles, but the price was so good, I don't really care. Even if it only lasts a year, it will be worth it for the ease alone!
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Jared & Cassidy Cornell
Title: Compact, lightweight & simple!
Body: We love this stroller. It has everything you need in one compact package. It’s simple, and efficient. It’s an all-around great stroller for those quick trips where you don’t want to bust out your bigger stroller, yet it’s comfortable enough for long walks on any surface.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Rose (LTN17)
Title: An okay stroller for short walks
Body: This Stroller is alright for when you’re going on a quick shopping trip or to the park. It’s lightweight but at the same time looks cheap. The cup holder is pretty small and can only fit narrow cups which doesn’t work well with my toddlers more rounded straw cups. Also it’s so difficult to fold up, it takes me 5 minutes just to get it to fold.Overall, not the hugest fan, my toddler looks like she’s sliding off at times and doesn’t seem comfortable. But again, if it’s a short trip then it works well for that.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: E
Title: The seat is too small for a 2 yr old.
Body: As the title reads.. the functionality of this stroller is great, just wish the seat area was wider/longer. Also the back rest is stiff and feels like thin cardboard, not comfy at all. Like other reviewers mention, cup holders are too small.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Dossou Faylineda
Title: Me gusta mucho ❤️
Body: Muchas gracias al vendedor y el servicio ☺️
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: julipi
Title: Wonderful little stroller
Body: We had spent a ton of money on expensive strollers and in the end they were bulky and not all that great. This stroller is small but has enough room for our 3 year old. It’s steady and comfortable. The cup holders are a bit narrow so you might have to pick a smaller water bottle for parent and baby.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: cWallin
Title: Perfect
Body: Easy to assemble, lightweight, great storage, 3 cup holders, sunshade and easily maneuverable. It’s great. Excellent product for the money!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Title: Light weight easy to open and close
Body: Very happy with stroller. Light weight easy to get into and out of car. Granddaughter rides comfortably.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Title: Sending back
Body: Wheels are hard to maneuver
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Title: Excelente
Body: Excelente
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: brianna
Title: Glad I bought this.
Body: Great stroller for the price. We’ve been using a wagon which is difficult to get in and out of the car and around places because of how big it is. Bought this for quick trips or trips to cities and small towns. It’s so easy to collapse and throw in the back of the car.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: chelsea patterson
Title: Gets the job done
Body: Overall stroller is easy to put together but it’s not as easy to fold with one hand. But once you get the hang of it at least you know what to do. Biggest concerns is simply the tiny cup holders. Barely fits a standard cup. This was one of the pluses of buying this but was disappointed by the small size so that is somewhat pointless. But overall the stroller is much better than the simple Mickey strollers and much more comfortable while still being compact. Would still highly recommend.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sandy Malcolm
Title: Front wheels fall off often, won’t stay locked in folded position.
Body: Front wheels fall off often, won’t stay locked when in folded up position.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Almost perfect
Body: This is a great light weight stroller. We were looking for a mid size…smaller than our bulky Bravo but bigger and more efficient than an umbrella stroller. Needed for airports and traveling, and this price was perfect. **BUT!** The biggest selling point on this was it had 3 cup holders, two up top, and one for the child. The cup holders are so small they don’t fit any of our reusable bottles!!!!! I am SO disappointed in this. This was the main reason I got this stroller and I am now trying to scramble to find a cup holder expander to work. Almost perfect. Almost.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Helena
Title: 1000% YES
Body: So light, easy to assemble, takes up no room & the wheels make it glide so easy!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Teresa
Title: Lots of storage, does not maneuver well at all
Body: Very hard to steer and push. I like the big basket and the cup holders, but the cupholders are on the small side (barely fitting the width of a soda can) and the bottom of the basket is flimsy cardboard. This stroller is a meh for me
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kristine
Title: Best cheap stroller!
Body: I love how light weight it is. It moves so smooth. It’s great for quick trips and on the go. Love it!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kyle B Mangels
Title: Missing piece
Body: I wish i could write a review about how great this stroller is but it’s missing a washer and O could tell while unpacking this was opened by someone else and sent back. Nothing was backed in the plastic bags or contained in the small boxes or foam tubing.Super disappointed.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: I generally loathe this thing
Body: Sure is easy to fold but that's it. And this is NOT for a baby without core control. Material is cheap and slippery. Lots of sliding and chaif. Older toddlers only.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Jeannette Polacco
Title: Easy to put together
Body: Did not know I would have to assemble.

Body: The wheels are not aligned when folded. Cheap low quality plastic wheels. Returned right after setup.

Author: Leticia
Title: Me encanto 🥰🥰🥳
Body: Las tres cosas
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Lizzy
Title: Fine
Body: Consider what your need is for this stroller. This stroller has a smooth ride only on a smooth surface (like indoors). It's very hard to maneuver outside on pavement/ grass/ anywhere that isn't smooth. Folds up easily, easy to put together, has a good tray for kid and place for cups for parents. It's also pretty short/ low so if one of the parents is tall, it can be quite uncomfortable to push for long periods of time.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kathryn
Title: So far it's been a life saver. The family loves it.
Body: The washer and everything is tied to the straps for the child. I thought they forgot to send them with the item. Had an anxiety attack thinking I spent all this money on something that I couldn't use but it was right there all along. The directions also come inside the bottom basket.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kindle Customer
Title: This product does not come assembled
Body: I will put the stroller together and then update this review. I cannot find anything in the description saying it needs to be assembled, but I may have missed it. From what I can tell it is lightweight and it looks sturdy.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kimberly K
Title: Doesn’t hold up
Body: When I first got it I absolutely loved it. A few things I’ve noticed that I’m not happy with is the seat doesn’t sit all the way up so my daughter is always leaned slightly back. She doesn’t like this, she wants to sit up and look around! Secondly, the wheels do get jammed a lot and I have to struggle until it starts moving forward again. Maybe I got a defected stroller. You do need two hands to close. I got this mainly so I can close the stroller in one hand and hold my baby in the other. If your child can’t stand and you’re alone it will be impossible. Baby cups and adult cups don’t fit in the stroller either. Adult cups are meant only for water bottles, won’t hold a yetti or anything that type. Kids tray is nice, but doesn’t fit a kids cup either. Lastly, stroller doesn’t go over grass or gravel without a fight. Meant only for pavement. Making fair season impossible.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Natalia fernandez
Title: Good for the price
Body: It was easy to build on your own and it’s good for the price I like it I would totally recommend buying unless you’re going hiking
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Alexis
Title: Terrible stroller
Body: I bought this stroller because I need something compact and light and it is! Very compact and light I’ll give it that! But the wheels are terrible get caught on everything my poor child would have flown out of the stroller a few times if he was bucked in! Any tiny bump in the road or sidewalk the wheels cannot go over anything bumpy without you completely stopping and going as slow as possible over it… And it is NOT a 1 hand foldable stroller!! Lies. I did not love it and returned it right away.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: jaquita
Title: Great for traveling
Body: Great for traveling light weight easy to fold
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: francesca
Title: Too High For What You Get
Body: The stroller for daily use is ok, but it is not as sturdy as it seems to be online and the storage space for stuff is a lot smaller than what was advertised. I don’t think this is worth the overall cost for it.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Insidia666
Title: Better than a wal mart stroller
Body: It's a bit spendy, yes, but it's worth it. The basket is larger than it looks in the photo. Tires are awesome, super easy to assemble, and I don't have trouble getting it through doors when I'm alone.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: NSV
Title: BUY IT!
Body: I'm not going to lie, this was a 2am impulse buy. We were using a stroller caddy up until we got a convertible carseat so a new stroller was a need. The stroller arrived this morning and I assembled as soon as it was dropped off, took me maybe 20 minutes and was easy! I'm a follow by the manual type girl.The cons I saw most people mention was the cup holders and how the wheels were wonky while closing. As far as the cup holders, the cup my child is holding fits in his cup holder with no issues. As far as the parent cup holders, considering I went from a stroller caddy and I got in the habit of tossing my water bottle in the storage basket and I will probably do the same while using this stroller. In the manual it explains exactly how to close the stroller properly and since I went by the book, I had no issues.We took a couple laps through the house and we have no complaints. My child was just a kicking his legs and smiling because he has view of everything now and loves it!I love how it's not bulky and lightweight too! I personally was not disappointed by this product and would recommend it to anyone. There is a reason why this product has over 9k reviews!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: GVee
Title: Almost Useless
Body: I do not like this stroller. My five month old granddaughter is very uncomfortable in it. The adjustment for sitting and reclining is awful. The stroller is lightweight but almost unusable. After putting it together I will not take it apart to return it. I would be embarrassed to even give it away.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Daisy Davis
Title: THE SEAT HAS NO CUSHION UNEXCEPTIONABLE
Body: I brought this for my grandson and it doesn’t have cushion for the seating area you could had made this with a cushion the bottom is way to hard and uncomfortable for the babies.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Foram
Title: It was a life save when traveling
Body: I like the item a lot, very start forward. I like the food tray option. The stroller is pretty basic. No angle change thing is available.It was a life saver when we were traveling. We travelled to Maine, London and Scotland and back to US. So it has gone through a lot manhandling I suppose during travel but works fine now. Definitely recommend.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Laura Zwart
Title: Light weight, lots of shade.
Body: We bought this stroller for our Disney vacation. All we had was a crappy hand-me-down umbrella stroller so this was a nice affordable upgrade. It has lots of pros and cons. I overall love it because it’s crazy lightweight and stands up on its own while closed. It’s very easy to move around and has cup holders for everyone and a snack tray. My son can easily climb in and out of it with the tray on but the tray also easily comes off. It has a decent recline for sleepy kids and lastly it has really good shade cover which was the biggest reason I bought it. Now for the cons, yes, it has a 5 point harness but I don’t totally love the hardware they used. However, it works well enough so we’ll just call it meh. The shade cover when fully pulled back kind of gets in the way of the drink holders but we’ll usually have it down so I’m not super worried. I wish the cup holders were a bit bigger especially for the child tray as his 360 doesn’t fit well in there. Lastly, we have NOT found this to be an easy one handed open and close. At minimum you need to add a foot to help it out. I think it’s something about the wheels not lining up right that makes it a little clunky when trying to close it. Also weird note, you have to use the locking piece on the side and the stroller actually folds up tighter than the locking mechanism allows. I found that odd.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Char
Title: Very wobbly
Body: I read really good reviews about this stroller which made me pick it. I will start by saying I am a little bit of a stroller snob and maybe my expectations were pretty high because I have the Uppababy Vista which I love!! Wanted something more lightweight and compact to take to Disney for my 5 month old but could still be big enough to fit my 6 yr old if his legs got tired and he needed a break. It was quick and easy to put together, however the stroller was very wobbly. Almost like the wheels would pop off. I had my husband check it out to make sure everything was tight and even after his check it was still wobbly. It didn’t feel sturdy enough to travel with through the airport. With only 1 day left until vacay I went to Walmart and found the Evenflo Reversi for $20 more. For the price I love the reversi! Very light weight, much easier to close, felt sturdy and ended up pushing my 6 yr old in it through the airport because our 5:30am flight was just too early for him. The Kolcroft was extremely difficult to close. I actually didn’t have enough strength to close it and the basket isn’t as big as it looks especially compared to my vista. The reversi basket was much bigger. I really did want to love this stroller.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Brittney E.
Title: Great compact travel stroller - only flaw is the lock!
Body: We bought this stroller for a weekend trip and found it easy to use and compact. Our daughter loved the little tray which includes the cup holder. It was perfect for snacks and a drink while navigating through the airport. The only thing that doesn't work well is the lock. It's not secure and we ended up having to use a velcro tie to get it to lock properly while gate checking it. Overall, it was worth the money!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Marvely G.
Title: Not to easy to fold with 1 hand
Body: This is advertised as fold with 1 hand, but it's a little hard to do it and need to use both hands, is very light, good material, love the fact that is easy to carry in my vehicle and move around.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Eder Trinidad
Title: Quality
Body: This stroller is amazing, good quality, easy to carry and very cute design. I love it.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Angela
Title: Budget stroller
Body: Definitely a budget option. Returned because it was difficult to close and the wheels are just a hard plastic so they didn’t seem that it would stand up to being anywhere outdoors
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great Travel Stroller
Body: I purchased for my 1 year old granddaughter. Overall very good stroller. I'm just still trying to figure out how to move back part from a reclining position to a sitting up position. Very hard for my granddaughter to try and sit up on her own while in a reclining position.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: gail ann
Title: Perfect for Disney world!
Body: I bought 2 of these strollers for my grandchildren for Disney world and they were perfect! it has a big basket at the bottom for storage a sun shade and cup holders that disney cups fit in everything you need!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Krista
Title: Weird Recline
Body: Overall it’s not terrible for the price. But the seat angle is bizarre. It is “adjustable” using a strap but the highest position is still reclined which didn’t fly with my toddler. Not worth it.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Tha sung
Title: N
Body: Good
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: JDiesch
Title: Good for price
Body: Need two hands to fold and unfold. After a while, the front wheels on ours bank hard left so we are always pulling right. Cleaned the wheels too with no luck. It’s great for traveling but not full time use.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Dominique Wilson
Title: Purchased it for my 7month old for our Disney trip. She loved it
Body: Very lightweight and easy to break down.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Pat

Body: Extremely easy to assemble and does exactly what we bought it for.

Title: Review
Body:
The media could not be loaded.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  
   Light weight I love it and it’s very easy to install, it is also as pictured I only wised it had more cushion but I definitely love it, it’s worth the price
