Author: K harv
Title: Nice lightweight stroller.
Body: Lightweight, moves without much effort, like the bottom basket for the extras. Cup holder on the tray could have been made a little bigger doesn’t hold all cups

Author: Sage
Title: Overall very good
Body: A little tricky to fold one handed but overall very good stroller! Definitely would buy again.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: KCollins
Title: Not to bad
Body: Easy to assemble, light weight. Can’t fold with one hand and front wheels have to be just right to permit closing. Also wish there was Velcro flap of material to use over peek a boo hole in top of canopy to keep sun out. A bit concerned about tires lasting. Time will tell. For the price and some extra hand usage it works fine.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: J. Moulton
Title: Waste of money
Body: TERRIBLE quality. Didn't even make it to our destination without breaking in transit. Waste of money
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Stephanie
Title: Light weight stroller does some heavy lifting!
Body: My baby is a heavy little guy and doesn’t walk yet, so a light weight, easy to use stroller that I can keep in the trunk is a must. Other light weight strollers I’ve tried are uncomfortable for him and don’t support his weight well. The Kolcraft Cloud Plus is sturdy and super easy to maneuver. And it’s cute!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sharon A. Principe
Title: Lightweight and portable
Body: Great stroller for my granddaughter. Easy to travel with and is very sturdy. She loves it.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Soffera
Title: All around best stroller
Body: I love this stroller so much. I have purchased many strollers ranging in price up to $700 and I promise you that this is my favorite one hands down. Now that I am older and wiser I know exactly what to look for as far as utility minus the bells & whistles when it comes to serving my needs as a parent. This is so simple in construction but practical in needs. Because it is so lightweight it is easy to maneuver & transport. The red is very vibrant and sporty. Folds easily for easy storage. This is an absolute winner. 10 out of 10!!!
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Jesus Butch Gonzalez
Title: Thumping
Body: Good
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Cydnee
Title: Not as compact as I thought it would be
Body: Pros:LightweightEasy to fold with one handDecent size under basket comes with adult and child trayCons:Not nearly as compact as I imagined it to beThe back reclines with the string pulling method... from previous experience this is a pain and ultimately it makes the back (cardboard feeling) seat give in and bend over time.I ended up returning this stroller for the evenflo uranium(sold through Walmart)
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sophia P. Kanavos
Title: You get what you pay for
Body: My son does not seem very comfortable sitting in it for long periods of time. The recline option is based on a belt strap that you tighten or loose, which does not work very well. Sometimes the front wheels get stuck when you try to fold. You have to move the wheels out of the way in order to fold properly. It is not ergonomic, and you will get tired from the friction if you are taking your little one for a long walk. Spend a little more and get something nicer.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Ingrid Granzza
Title: It’s great
Body: For what it’s worth it’s great! Very light weight and easy to assemble.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Billy Mann
Title: 4 stars
Body: I like it but the wheels keep falling off. Easy to put back on, but need a way to lock lock on, instead of just pop them on. I still use it all the time. My son likes to sit up so this is perfect.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Loved it!
Body: Love it!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: NKakanis
Title: Great for the price!
Body: Great stroller! We bought it as a lightweight option for a trip to Disney World. It’s great on the go. So light, easy to fold, and easy to steer. Plenty of storage in the basket below. My only two complaints are that the stroller folds a certain way that doesn’t allow for items to be stored below. So you have to move everything to the seat before folding. Also, the cup holders don’t hold normal sized beverages. None of our daughter’s sippy cups fit in the cup holders. Not a huge issue, we would just sit them next to her in the seat. But kind of annoying from time to time. Not a deal breaker by any means. I recommend this for the price and utility!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Jasmine Reeder
Title: Missing
Body: Missing a wheel
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Ashley
Title: Great stroller
Body: Amazing!! Easy to push and put together
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: BoyMom
Title: Love it!!
Body: I love the easy folding its great cuz im a single mom so handling it on my own is EASY
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Linda
Title: Kolcraft Cloud Plus Lightweight Easy Fold Compact Travel Baby Stroller, Slate Grey
Body: I love this stroller! It was easy to assemble and very easy to fold up. I love how lightweight it is and how easy it is to maneuver. I definitely recommend it. :)
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Victoria Grace
Title: Easy to fold. Easy to assemble.
Body: I love this stroller. The price is great. I watched a YouTube video on how to assemble it and it only took about 10 minutes. It’s easy to fold. I love the baby head cover and the basket underneath.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: C. Bentley
Title: Great replacement for an umbrella stroller
Body: Much better than any umbrella stroller! Super light weight. Only need one hand to push it. Extended canopy is the best feature and a must in the hot Florida sun. Love the big basket, tray, cup holders and recline feature. Baby likes to sit up straight so I have to put a baby blanket behind him. Wish the stroller had a reversible handle so baby could face forward or backwards. Otherwise this is a perfect stroller. We use it to go on walks everyday.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great stroller!
Body: This stroller is lightweight and easy to fold up and toss in the back of the car. I had been struggling with a larger , less maneuverable and more expensive stroller before I found this one on Amazon for a great price.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Lindsey
Title: Great Light weight stroller
Body: This was just what we were looking for! Its so light weight and I love how easy it is to push around. Looking forward to using it in Disney!Edit: we absolutely loved this stroller for disney! Folds with one hand and was very easy to store and maneuver around the airport and parks. Our little one napped very comfortably in it too! Highly recommend.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: A_Rodkey
Title: Perfect
Body: So compact and light ❤️
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: M.E.S.
Title: Good buy
Body: I have a 1.5 year old and a 5 month old and my double stroller does NOT fit in my trunk (2014 Ford focus) so I bought 2 of these strollers and they were easy to put together, took me about 5 minutes per stroller and they BOTH fit in my trunk, they look nice and super good price!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kerry
Title: Easy Peasy!
Body: This was super easy to put together! I thought it didn’t come with directions but they actually fell under my couch when I was taking everything out. But I easily put it together without directions in like 15 minutes!It rides so smooth and is lightweight. Just an all around nice, simple stroller!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kiara Rugama
Title: Recomendado
Body: Muy buena
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: L Hunt
Title: Missing parts
Body: The stroller seems nice except it is missing the clips that hold the wheels on.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Ariana Lam
Title: Great buy
Body: Very easy to assemble. Light weight and does not take up too much space either in your vehicle or the house. Great quality item for the price.

Title: the product is not useble for mi any more

Author: Javad Shafiei Shiva
Title: Worst stroller ever! Dont buy it.
Body: I understand it is pretty cheap, but I wad expecting some minimum quality...It is really small and my 3 yrs doesnt fit comfortably. You have to take ta tray out completely each time. The cup holder is so small that you cant even put a small water bottle. Tray itself is tiny! After a few days of light use, it wheels started making noises. This cant handle a very small bump on walkways. The cover folds too fast and hits your hand when you are pishing the stroller.All in all, this is an engineering/design mistake! Save your money and time, spend some more money and something better.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: ashley norwood
Body: Easy put together after I googled for a video. I didnt find the booklet until after I put it together. Lol folds easy. Lightweight. Havent used it yet but I already love it!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Alberta Ward
Title: Extremely cheap...price and quality
Body: If you are looking for a compact lightweight stroller, this is for you. But if you are looking for quality, this is not the stroller for you. The front wheels vibrates, and the metal holding the stroller together sounds like hallow tin. At $66 you definitely get what you pay for.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: CourtneyM
Title: Missing pieces
Body: Didn’t come with the cotter pins to hook on the back two tires. What am I supposed to do with a stroller that doesn’t have two back tires.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Jillian Blum
Title: Great for travel
Body: I bought this for a trip and needed something lightweight for the airport. It was perfect. Easy to fold up and open, light enough to carry with one hand while holding my kid in the other. It turned very easily with my girl and a bag in the bottom. I will say that I was unable to fold it up with one hand like advertised, but easy as cake with two
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Alyssa Wade
Title: I’m a person who travels ALOT, so this stroller can definitely take up less space !
Body: Easy to put together, and definitely seems like a way better stroller to travel with !
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Audrey pierson
Title: Quality stroller
Body: Other than the basket part being too small its perfect
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Tierra Pool
Title: Overall a very convenient stroller.
Body: It's lightweight and moves around freely. Great for traveling on public transportation. The only dislike is that it's not a one hand fold as stated. This isn't a stroller for everyday use. If you are traveling light this stroller is convenient. Yes the cup holders are small this is why it's good too pack a small diaper back for extra carry.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Lisa Marie Chavez
Title: Amazing stroller
Body: I am in love with this stroller for my toddler! Such a great buy. I put it together in less than 10 minutes. My son loves it! It’s lightweight, easy to collapse with one hand. And it is compact and fits perfectly in our trunk.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Paulina Gonzalez
Title: Worst stroller I’ve ever used
Body: The worst stroller I’ve ever used. Wheels are loud and bumpy, not a smooth ride. The clip on the bottom to strap baby in is literally the only thing that holds her up and from not falling right out of the stroller. Terrrible!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Emily
Title: Perfect
Body: I loveeeee it
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Heather
Title: It is lightweight
Body: Yes, it is lightweight but that's pretty much the only pro about this stroller. It is very cheaply made and I have never had to put so many parts together on a stroller before. I'm use to just having to snap wheels on and call it a day. This one, you practically build it all, piece by piece, except the frame. I'm only 5'4 and the handle is too short for me. It also does not handle well, it's hard to steer and the wheels constantly get stuck. The latch to lock it close doesn't align with the bar to latch it onto. The front wheels ALWAYS get in the way whenever I fold it. The seat is extremely thin and flimsy. You can lower the back of the seat a bit with the strap in the back but norther how high or low you adjust the back to, your kid will literally slip right out if you don't buckle them in. Good luck loosening the seat belt.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sophie Charles
Title: Very light weight
Body: Everting about it is good glad I bought it
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: veritas
Title: A good stroller
Body: We bought this to use when our granddaughter comes to visit. It’s lightweight, and the canopy is very big to hide the Florida sun. Good product for the money and very simple to assemble.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Suzanne Maher
Title: Great product!
Body: Easy to open and close. Compact for small areas. Great product!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: IMSAM
Title: Light weight
Body: Perfect to manage and light weight
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Maria Romero-Ponce
Title: Lightweight and compact but latch doesn't work.
Body: I would have gave this 5 stars but I have one complaint. When you fold it up the latch doesn't work. Besides that I really like this stroller. It's lightweight and compact.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: JoshuaTheFox
Title: Good stroller but seat back doesn't lay back
Body: This is a smaller stroller which was just what I was looking for. It is light weight and folds up nicely so it's easy to take everywhere with us. There were only 2 things I didn't like about it. First is that the crotch strap is not adjustable and is very long so I have to us a rolled up towel or blanket so my daughter wouldn't slide down too far. once she is a bit older I didn't think I will have this probably. The second thing I didn't like was that the seat back doesn't lay back far at all, maybe 3 inches back. If my daughter falls asleep in the stroller i can't lay her back so her head just flops to the side
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Michael Tristancho
Title: THE BEST STROLLER!
Body: It’s super light weight, very easy to fold.. and the way it rolls feels amazing!!! Super smooth travel.. we took it to Disney and it was the best! You could literally push it with one hand. LOVE IT!!!! And the fact that you could lean the back all the way down was a plus.. my daughter was very comfortable
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Stacy Miles
Title: Affordable vacation Stroller
Body: Very lightweight! We use this stroller for vacations and it’s so easy to throw in a car and go. The tray table is great but doesn’t fit some bottles.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: G. K
Title: Kolcraft Is Like Riding a Cloud ☁️!
Body: This stroller wadnmy Christmas gift for my1st Grandson! My son is so happy that he has a son and this is his first child. Stroller is very durable and features are just what any parent would love to have for there baby.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Angelina Solomon
Title: Cheap but not durable is you use your stroller a lot like my self
Body: I love that it is lightweight for sure ! But the durability of this stroller to me isn’t very well the very first use of this stroller was yesterday at target and my one year old was in it and the back two wheels were very wobbly and seemed like they won’t last very long the cup holder sucks it’s to small even for my insulated cup that only a 20 oz slim cup just like a normal drinking glass her bottle wouldn’t fit in her tray but some what fit the parents holder, the canopy or sun visor isn’t very protective rain went right through it as it started to rain as we were walking into the store and we only had like ten-20 feet away for entering and it was soaked from a light rain so I am making a return unfortunately I am looking for a smaller stroller as my four year old is about to be five in about a month and we think it’s time for her to graduate from the big double stroller that we spent a lot of money on but on a good note it doubles as a single stroller but it’s big so I wanted something smaller and lightweight as to why i have bought this so I will continue my search I hope my review helps I will update with pics as soon. As I go to remove it from my car to package up I will take pics before hand
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Honey
Title: Great !!
Body: Worked wonderfully for our trip to Disneyworld!
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Daniela
Title: The best
Body: So strong
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Mrs. King
Title: Easily Accessible
Body: This stroller is so easy to use. I love how easily it folds up and fits in my trunk, and it’s not too heavy. My baby sits in it perfectly. I wish the back was more upright instead of laying back inclined somewhat. The incline is nice when she sleeps, but not when she’s awake. It does have straps, and those are secure and easy to use.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: andre mabon
Title: Convenient
Body: Love the product
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sarah
Title: Squeaky
Body: After about 4 months of using, it's squeaking! It's driving me absolutely insane. Not sure if it's just a fluke issue, but I hate the squeaking. I love this stroller so so much, I just wish I could figure out how to stop the squeaking.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Troy Fanelli
Title: I FOUND A CUP THAT FITS
Body: If you are like me- you LOVE this stroller but it was IMPOSSIBLE to find a cup that is toddler proof that will fit in the cup holder. We will be taking this stroller to Universal Studios so I knew I had to find a cup that will fit into the tiny cup holder so my toddler can drink water all day. Today I went to Target and bought a few to try out and I FOUND ONE! It’s a stainless steel straw cup from the baby aisle at target and the brand is “Zak!” Now that I finally figured that out, all my dislikes about the stroller are taken care of!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Suzanne
Title: Only three of the four wheels tough the ground
Body: It is light weight but hardly any padding for baby. The real problem is that only three of the four wheels touch the ground.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Jamally Rivera
Title: It broke the first month I had it
Body: It broke on me the first month I bought it
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Robin L.
Title: Very well put together! sturdy!
Body: once takemn out of box it took around 2-3 mins to assemble. so easy to put together, my 2 year old soon loves to go for walks now and now begs to go for a walk. love it!
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Yas
Title: Love it. Can’t wait to use it
Body: I bought this for my 7mo. He’s really big for his age and i wanted a light weight stroller so he can sit instead of being in a car seat stroller. It’s super light, i feel like i barely need to push. It was really easy to put together, less than 10 min. I love that the umbrella hood is long enough to cover more, unlike other strollers I’ve seen. It’s pretty great!! Don’t pass up on it.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Privacy Matters
Title: seat straps made of cheap material
Body: cheaply made harness that holds child in the seat isnt made of stronger material the child at times appears to be sliding down out of the seat
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Vladislav Pavlov
Title: It very good
Body: It very good i like it !!!!!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Anyah
Title: Buy ! better then umbrella stroller
Body: Fits in my tiny chevy spark! and it's smooth and fold easy
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Emily
Title: Very nice budget stroller
Body: Lightweight, easy to fold and the price is right. Very happy with this purchase!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Karina grant
Body: Es un coche muy lindo y la verdad muy practico, lo recomiendo
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Melly
Title: Great for travel
Body: This is a great stroller for the price. It is light weight and easy to fold. It does stick a bit when folding, but if you use two hands you can get it to collapse all the way. I have used it for airport travel and it was perfect. Be aware that if you hang anything heavy off of the handle it will likely tip over while/after you remove your child.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Charlotte
Title: Definitely recommend!
Body: This stroller is fantastic. We don’t use one as much as most people, so I didn’t want to spend a lot on a stroller, but knew I wanted something nicer than those simple cloth fold up ones. This was perfect. It was cheap, it’s comfortable for my son, it steers SO EASY, holds quite a bit underneath. It’s incredibly easy to fold up! I’ve never had issues folding it- and it easily folds one handed. It’s been thrown around in all our vehicles a ton and hasn’t been damaged at all. It’s super lightweight, which I wanted because I have a bad back. My husband and I are also tall (5’11” & 6’3”) and it’s comfortable to push for us since the handle height is slightly taller than others.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Mickey1957
Title: Good buy
Body: Easy to use and store
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Carissa
Title: Great for it's price.
Body: Because it is so lightweight it seemed like it was going to be a bit flimsy but I was wrong. This thing has held up to several long walks a day for the last month and doesn't look like it is going to change anytime soon. My two year old loves her new ride too.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Michael Ondejko
Title: Good price, but not good quality.
Body: Not very sturdy. Difficult to collapse. Tray too small.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: June Bowers

Body: I love that this stroller has everything I want in a stroller. Easy to fold, lightweight, storage at the bottom. I live in an apt with no elevator so this stroller was perfect. I love the way it folds up and can be placed in a closet or near the doorway.

Title: The WORST. ZERO Maneuverabilty.
Body: My sister and I bought this stroller for my other sister and our new nephew. I guess it is like they say, You get what you pay for...It has to be lightweight and easy to fold because most of the time you have tonthrow it over your shoulder and carry it plus your child due to no maneuverability! The maneuvering is horrendous. You can not steer with two hands let alone one and the wheels are so cheaply made they go over nothing, even those little cracks in the sidewalk trip this piece up. It is a terrible product. I have never written such a scathing review but this was so annoying to push my nephew in- it was as if the product was never tested with a child inside it. A lousy, poorly made and designed product. I actually feel so bad that we bought this gift for my sister. Instead of making life easier for her, it made it more work-the last thing you need with a child. Please.

Author: Jeremy
Title: Great for Price
Body: I need a stroller for my 2 year old to use for air travel and for around town stuff. This one fit the bill and price point. Decided to wait until I had traveled a bit with it to review. It folds easy but as others have mentioned it does require another hand or solid surface to mash against to make it close completely. And often you have to shake it a tad to unfold from the locked status. Storage underneath is plenty for a backpack/diaper bag as well as a jacket or something similar. My only real complaint is the size of the cup holders. They will hold a store bottle of water, they will not hold most refillable water bottles or anything larger than a narrow bottle. If that were fixed I would have moved up to 5*.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Sometimes I do have to push the stroller against my side to make sure it locks in place but I am still able to do that with one hand while I hold my son. I love this stroller!!! So worth the buy and it was everything I thought it was going to be and more.

Title: Lightweight, but has a lot of flaws
Body: I bought this stroller hoping to get a lightweight, compact, easy to fold stroller. It was very lightweight, but it wasnt easy to fold (or keep folded) and when folded wasnt much smaller than the stroller we already have. I returned it after 2 uses. The breaks are impossible to take off if you are in sandals/flip flops and the latch for locking the stroller when folded isnt positioned well. Our little one also didnt sit very well in the seat itself. It is kind of at an odd angle. I did like the extended canopy and how light and easy to put together it was, but it did not work for us.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

I would recommend for grandparents like myself that may use it once a week or so. I gave it four stars because the cup holders are small, especially one for adult cups.

Author: STUFFILOVE
Title: Not Comfortable
Body: The stroller was super easy to assemble (and light), however it isn’t very comfortable for my daughter. The seat is strange. I can’t figure it out, but it’s hard for my daughter to not slide forward. She’s harnessed in, yet still slides and because there is no comfort guard for the harness buckles, it just digs into her diaper causing a wedgie-like situation. She doesn’t like to sit in for long... it’s unfortunate. Also, the cup holder holes at the top are too tiny to hold a cup. So even though it’s nice in theory, they are completely useless.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Tracy
Title: Great little stroller
Body: **UPDATE: I changed the review to 5 stars. I still really like this stroller and I use it almost every day out in my back yard. I've used it on regular walks, at the store, and as i said, the boardwalk, along with my yard and in my stone driveway. It maneuvers just fine and has held up great, though I don't abuse my strollers. I don't really fold this up much anymore because I use it daily, so the fact that I can't fold it one handed just is so minor for me. Still completely recommend this stroller.So far I have only used this twice and I love it. Its exactly what I wanted. I wanted it because its more than an umbrella stroller but not a heavy full size stroller. Its very light weight and folds pretty compact, easy to fit in any trunk or back seat. Other reviews said that this stroller was hard to maneuver and was very hard hitting on any kind of bump even the tiny cracks in the sidewalk. I have not experienced this issue whatsoever. We used it on the boardwalk and I also pushed it around my yard today in my stone driveway and in the grass and it did perfectly fine. Some said their kids were being jolted forward at every bump, again we have not experienced this at all on either terrain type. The basket is big enough to throw in a sweatshirt or 2 and small diaper bag or purse and some toys. Thats what I wanted. The only thing I had to knock some stars off for was the ease of folding. Could be because its brand new that its just stiff, but i am unable to fold it one handed with ease. I have to lift up on the child tray often to get it to close and the wheels don't always fall into position to provide a full fold without manually turning them. It is however, easy to unfold one handed so this issue is definitely minor, at least for us. Overall I completely recommend this stroller.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: monica sowers
Title: Received broken stroller!
Body: Received defective product. Wheels are bent and wobble. Bought it for vacation and went to use it and it was not useable. Very disappointed! Expected better quality for what I paid for it. Already threw away the box so I can’t return!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great Product | Tiny Cup Holders
Body: As long as you don't need a cup holder, this is a great product. It's very lightweight, it folds up so easily, and baby rides comfortably. The cup holders are veeeeery small. You might be able to fit a White Claw or a slim fit can, but nothing else. The stroller seat back height can be adjusted. It uses a strap, so you either tighten it to raise it, or lessen it to lean it back. It does not recline all the way. Other than the weird quirks, it's been a lifesaver and a great product.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Shopping Maven
Title: Great stroller except for the seat
Body: I really liked this stroller. It has a great canopy, a tray for the child to keep a drink or a toy, wheels move well, it's fairly easy to open and close, and there's a large storage compartment under the seat. What I didn't like, and was the deal breaker, are the positions of the seat itself. There is no true upright position, and my 18 mo old grand daughter is way too reclined even on the highest setting for the seat. She was very slouched down, and the straps were the only things holding her to the seat. I wanted to keep using this, but seeing her look so uncomfortable every time we went somewhere forced me to look for a better option.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

The parent and child cupholders are too small to fit any of our cups, which is not a huge deal, but is annoying. I just carry my drink when I walk or use a water bottle with a sealable lid, and keep it in the basket underneath. I don't think I'd buy it again, but it gets the job done!

Author: Anna P
Title: Kolcraft baby carriage
Body: The wheels don’t have hardware to hold the wheels on the axle . No manufacturing instructions in the box . Very disappointed!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Stephanie Jordan
Title: You get what you pay for
Body: It is lightweight and easy to fold. I love the canopy on it. It is pretty flimsy. I've purchased much less expensive strollers and they were much steadier. I am short so height not a problem but I can see why people complain who are taller as it is very short and it would be difficult if you wanted to walk fast or run pushing the stroller if you are tall.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kathy Ruble
Title: Great little stroller
Body: Bought this stroller for walks with my grandson and it's working out great. Very easy to open and close - in fact I can do it with one hand while holding him with the other. It's very light and I can easily lift it in and out of the car trunk.It's much easier for me to maneuver than his full-sized stroller and I've had no trouble pushing it, even on short gravel pathways. My only complaint is the cup holders are too small (diameter) to hold any of my cups. They're more sized to fit a slim water bottle, but there is plenty of room in the basket for a purse, diaper bag, etc. Very happy with this purchase.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Frank
Title: Stroller is Okay. Good buy if you are on a budget. Not comfortable for Baby.
Body: I love the idea that this stroller is lightweight. I also love the idea that it is a cost effective alternative to the more expensive strollers. The one drawback, and the reason that this stroller doesn't cost more is the fact that it is not comfortable for babies. Babies cannot sit upright with support to their backs. For laying down or laying back, the stroller is fine, but sitting upright is a problem. Baby is going to be uncomfortable sitting upright.Other than that, the stroller is fine. Wheels are a really cheap plastic though, so beware.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Pen Name
Title: It's good but has its flaws.
Body: It's not easy to fold at first but once you get a handle on it you're good to go. The stroller is so lightweight, moves and rotates so well. The bottle holder are not that big so if you use Avanti baby bottles they won't fit. The storage area on the bottom looked bigger in the images not so much in person.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: katherine
Title: Super Lightweight
Body: I got this stroller for my 15 months old baby I love how lightweight is it but the only thing is when I close it the lock doesn’t click on it.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: rachel r boltz
Title: Fits Disney size requirements
Body: Very light weight. We bought this to take to Disneyland. We didn't want to bring a heavy stroller that was bulky. Since Disney has size limit on strollers. It was light weight easy to told up and to bring on the plane and the cab not to big
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Impossible to close.
Body: I used this stroller twice and the second time i was unable to fold it. I had to open it to figure it out and still haven't been able to close it.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: TRexgirl
Title: I like it just fine!
Body: It’s compact enough to fit in my small trunk, it has 2 cup holders for the driver (& a place for my phone) and a cup holder for the child. I’m a grandmother it is a perfect stroller for us to go for walks or shopping in. It’s pretty simple to fold and unfold. My grand dog likes to hitch a ride when he gets tired, and there’s plenty room in the basket. You do have some assembly, but it was simple enough.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Luna
Title: Good
Body: Very good I love it
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Maria pacheco
Title: Me encanto muy comoda
Body: Muy cómodo y bonito
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Jessica Romero
Title: Great purchase
Body: Perfect size! It’s compact but still has the storage space
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Deb chicago
Title: Assembly easy, well made
Body: We purchased this for when our grandchild visits. It was easy, minor assembly consisting of putting on wheels and trays. Instructions were explicit and easily understood. Nice tray for adult drinks as well as baby’s. Good value!
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Karen
Title: Cupholders for something like a Dixie cup.
Body: I like the stroller for the money. Good value. My only wish with that there would be a cupholder large enough for an adult drink. There are two cupholders but they are very small, narrow and shallow.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Esther
Title: Love it
Body: Excellent
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: jared
Title: Hard No!
Body: Stroller broke in less than a week. The mechanism on the handle to collapse the stroller broke leaving us unable to collapse it. When we could collapse it the latch to hold it shut had nowhere to hook so it always popped open. The front wheels would also get in the way when collapsing. Lastly, the cup holders are so small they're virtually useless. I have no clue how this stroller had such good reviews, it is flawed in so many ways.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Mary
Title: Nice ride 😍
Body: Yessss!! This was a great purchase; I needed a light, easy to fold & easy to maneuver stroller, and this is the best so far. My toddler is 37 months old and is a 38 pound baby 👶🏻 (chunky) I had the baby trend EZ ride stroller, but just didn’t work for me, to difficult to maneuver , heavy and not easy to fold 😣. Till I found this beauty 😍I give 5 stars ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️👏🏼👏🏼
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Joanie Brooks
Title: Fun in the sun!
Body: It fits our 2 1/2 year old well. We love everything about it.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Micahel E.
Title: Great Stroller
Body: Light weight and easy to use.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Alicia Cole
Title: Do not waste your money
Body: This stroller is very cheaply made. Do NOT waste your money. The only good thing about this stroller is that it is light weight. The basket is much small, the seat is angled and even with the seat leaned all the way back which it doesn't lean back much at all it still sits forward too much and the child will fall out if you stop too suddenly without harness on on the tray on. The shocks are just cheap plastic. It does not easily fold at all and you can not push it after it is folded. You must basically drag it. Overall a terrible waste of money
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Rhonda
Title: item is very light and easy to fold for storage.
Body: Very nice stroller for the price. The back does lay back for your child to take a nap. In the front of the child is a place for their cup or snacks. The bottom can hold diaper bag and a few groceries. The top has a cup holder and a place for keys or cell phone.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kimberly Reese
Title: great stroller
Body: Very reliable. Easy to clean and to store.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Roxanne
Title: It’s easy to use and light weight
Body: This is perfect we bought an expensive one when baby was born and this is so much better!!! Love it!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: bscalhoun
Title: Great light stroller
Body: Bought this for my 4 month old as he has already outgrown his infant travel system. Great light weight stroller! Easy to fold, great canopy with good sun protection, vented well. Attached a fan to the child tray and it is able to stay on even when folded and put in the trunk.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Diane Avasakdi
Title: Save your money
Body: The strapes don’t adjust.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Catherine
Title: Perfect for small babies!
Body: Our little one is 3 months old and loves to be outside. This stroller is easy to take out instead of using the big heavier stroller. We put a mesh net over it to keep away the mosquitoes and she is happy out in the yard while I work. Glad we bought it!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Jessica
Title: great but small trays/cupholders
Body: overall great for the price but the cup holders are way too small compared to my last stroller. i can’t fit mostly any of her cups in the trays. i’m wondering if i can just find different trays since they’re snap on pieces?
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Tonia S.
Title: Great stroller
Body: Great stroller, especially for the price!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Joe Lippy
Title: it is light weight and folds up nicely
Body: I like how easy it was to put the Grandson in
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Teresa B.
Title: Easy to use
Body: I like everything about it. Very happy with it.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Julia Santizo
Title: Perfect lightweight stroller
Body: Great lightweight stroller! Easy to assemble and use. Would recommend.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Petrina Ruth Pledger
Title: Toddler
Body: Perfect one for my son
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Wajid Arif
Title: A++
Body: Very easy to assemble.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Hen
Title: Good value
Body: Bought this stroller for vacation and so far we’re happy with it. If you don’t lock the little lever when you fold it up it does pop open which is annoying, but fixable...The front wheel has been squeaking lately but it likely just needs to be greased.I have found that the “Take and Toss” spill-proof straw cups DO fit in the snack tray cup holder, but no others that I’ve tried so far.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Chesther Cuento
Title: Fast shipping
Body: Fast shipping. Arrived on time. My daugther loves it
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Ashlee
Title: Easy to manage
Body: Does not go all the way back to lay down your baby
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Brandon Greene
Title: Most likely won’t have it long.
Body: So, there’s a few reasons I only have it a 3 star compared to other strollers I’ve used.Pros:-It’s lightweight-Folds easily-Decent height-Cover covers a lot from the sunCons-You have to take the tray off every time you want to put your little nugget in (kinda annoying)-The cover covers so much that my son has limited sight and he loves looking around-Cup holders are close to the hand bar so you’ll probably be rubbing knuckles on whatever’s in there-There isn’t any kind of padding on the 5 pt harness so the bottom part goes straight to the side of his diaper and looks wildly uncomfortable for himAll in all is decent for the price, but I’ll probably end up getting a different one soon
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: longe samuel temitayo
Title: But is okay
Body: Different scratches on it and dose not come with net
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Samantha
Title: Stoller
Body: I absolutely love this stroller!!! My daughter loves it! Its 100% as advertised!!!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Brenda
Title: Highly recommend
Body: This is a lightweight version of a full size stroller and it told so smoothly. I didn't have to keep trying to get it to close.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Perfect for the money!!!
Body: I bought this stroller because I wanted a cheap stroller that my 3 year old could fit in without having to carry him on vacations and chase after him. This stroller was PERFECT! My husband even bragged on it while on vacation. It's super easy to maneuver, very light weight, smooth when pushing, and leans back just enough where he could comfortably take a nap and we could store his diaper bag and shopping bags in the bottom. I would highly recommend it to anyone (actually I already have to two friends)!!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: S H
Title: Not to bad hope it's comfortable for my daughter..
Body: There are many pros and cons to this stroller. I have 3 cons about this stoller, 1 the tray doesn't swivel you have to pop it on and off each time, and secondly my daughter is almost 2 she skinny but tall about 32 inches in height. The seat depth from her hips to knees is very shallow and makes it so she is being pushes her hips forward and sits on her sacrum. I am a therapist and have experiencing measuring wheelchairs and regular chairs for patients. The way the stroller is made there isn't enough room for her to sit back properly there is minimal space between the back and the edge of stroller.3rd con is the recline the description states it reclines but barely and the hard plastic piece on the inside I removed.PROS: As far as easy maneuverability and easy fold A+ and it is lightweight to push one handed. A nice large storage basket.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Robert
Title: I love it
Body: Its just like the picture, my son love it so much. i you thinking o getting one pls do.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: DJK
Title: Favorite everyday stroller
Body: Easy one hand fold. Lightweight.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Hallee
Title: Reliable
Body: Put together Very Easy, Cute, Affordable
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Tiny
Title: Not worth $70!
Body: Purchased for my toddler son as an alternative to an umbrella stroller. The cup holder does not fit ANY sized drinks in them....no cans of soda, no bottles of water for Mom & Dad...NOTHING! I think they are there more-so for decoration. Also, not very much storage space underneath the stroller nor at the top near the 'parent compartment', which is totally USELESS. My son was riding in the stroller and it unfolded with him inside of it before our very eyes. Generic made and definitely not worth almost $70! The pictures look nice on Amazon, but you will not be impressed....guaranteed.Very disheartening as I thought I had finally found a stroller that could fit in with our lifestyle. Silly me... will be returning!
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Durable product, easy assembly and great pric.
Body: My one year old grandson needed a bigger stroller for our house and this one was perfect! High quality and easy to assemble. Love the space under the seat for carrying all kinds of things. Definitely like the price! Great product!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Good for the price!
Body: I bought this stroller to keep at our vacation home. The stroller was very easy to setup. I personally couldn’t fold it with one hand, I’m petite with small hands and just couldn’t. The only things I don’t like about the stroller are that the peep hole doesn’t have a flap to cover it to prevent weather from getting onto the baby/child (see pictures) and I wish the back could sit up a little higher but it seems to be okay enough. Other than that it truly is lightweight and a good bang for your buck!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: tiffanie
Title: It's perfect
Body: I can pick this stroller up with one finger if I wanted to it's that light and it's of really good quality I love it my son loves it to very breathable and he can see alot more and it fits everywhere it's perfect
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Michelle L Christian
Title: Win/win situation
Body: I can not believe how easy this was to set up. Wow. It makes life a lot easier as well. You can push it so easy without killing your self like you do with some strollers. This was a great price when we bought it. My granddaughter loves it so it’s a win/win situation. It’s a lightweight stroller but has the ability of a big stroller to go anywhere.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Maria Davis
Title: Would recommend this product
Body: Purchased for my grandson. My son says it is perfect. Easy to maneuver as well as unfolding and packing up to go.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Anasko
Title: Wrong seat angle, a child slides off the stroller
Body: I bought this stroller because of othed reviews and light weight. With 5 children I had many different strollers, that were great, good and not good. This one is not good. A. It doesn't fold easily. B. When it is folded it's wide and takes more space than umbrella stroller, C. The main concern: the seat has a slope and my child needs to support her with legs not to slide off the stroller.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Chelsie
Title: It’s great!
Body: This stroller is by far the easiest stroller to travel with. Very light weight, takes up far less space than other strollers I have had. My daughter (she’s almost 2) seems to really like it. It also shields her eyes from the sun far better than more expensive strollers I have had. I bought her a new one simply because I let a friend borrow the stroller I had and it was brought back to me in horrible condition. *sigh* I’m 5”3 and it is perfect for my height. Two complaints that I do have is the bottom basket a bit smaller than I’m used to and it’s a pretty tight fit for my diaper bag. Plan to only be able to only put a diaper bag that’s on the smaller side in there. Also, the cup holders are not wide enough for the wider soppy cups that I have for my daughter. I had to invest in some more slimmer cups for her.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sandra O Smith
Title: Came so fast.
Body: I love it.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Beth
Title: Super lightweight, but I couldn’t get it to fold
Body: I wanted to love this stroller. The size is great and it is so lightweight! However, when I assembled it, the front wheels do not allow the stroller to fold. I tried several different things, even reassembling to see if I did something wrong, but I could not get it to fold down properly, so it wasn’t usable for my needs.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Veronica
Title: Es bueno pero no pesa nada ! Se siente frágil
Body: Muy frágil
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Rebecca Carroll
Title: It works
Body: Strap adjustments are difficult. For the price, it’s a good stroller.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Iiseh
Title: Good product
Body: Great quality. Great buy.recommended
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Alisa H.
Title: Just buy it!
Body: Very nice! Light and easy to use, baby loves it. Buy!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: joyz
Body: As a first time mom, I just needed something comfortable for her, easy to put together and ready to move. Not gonna take too much space in my car, even though it’s a 7 seated SUV because I hate my car being all cramped and loaded.Got this and it took me less than 20mins to put together. Very light weight and works perfect for me
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Stephanie Trussell
Title: Don't waste your money
Body: I really wanted to like this stroller since I loved my last kolcraft but good grief it is a lemon. It doesn't fold nicely and is always a struggle to get it to fold flat. One of the clips on the harness just unhook randomly. The front tires have never worked well but now they are squealing. I am half tempted to toss it but really need something until I get a replacement. I love the color and thats about it. Don't buy this stroller, you will regret it.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: TM
Title: Nice stroller
Body: It doesn’t recline flat. It does go back by adjusting the strap behind the seat. I wish it went back a little further but it is a great stroller. We took it to Hawaii with a one year old and it worked great.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Laura
Title: Wonderful and must must have!
Body: I wish I had bought this sooner! As soon as I got it out of the box my 1 yr old insisted she sit in it. And once I got it together, which was pretty easy, we had to test it out for about 20 mins through the house. My daughter loves riding in it. I love that I can open and close it with one hand. Only thing I wish was different is the cupholders, I wish they were bigger. I have yet to find a cup that fits.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Ivy
Title: You won’t regret buying it!
Body: BUY IT!! I seriously love this stroller!! We have gad multiple strollers. The last one we had was Graco click connect that had the option for older child to sit on stand on the back. It was an ok stroller but heavy and bulky. My oldest is pretty independent so there wasn’t a need to keep it. I wanted to get a new one but I didn’t want to spend a lot of money on something that we use here in there for camping, walking the neighborhood, and at the zoo. You can’t beat the price of the stroller and the quality is exceptional. The grips for the handles are super comfortable. It drives smooth. The cup holders on the top are perfect for water bottles and they don’t rattle and fall out. The basket underneath is easily accessible. With being in quarantine, I have been using it a lot more than I thought I would walking our neighborhood. I highly recommend this stroller!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: TRI TAN MINH HUYNH
Title: Easy folding
Body: Very light and convenient folding
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Hjurgens
Title: Junk!
Body: This stroller is mostly junk! One of the wheels doesn't look completely round which is why I think it is so hard to push. You have to have both hands to push and most of the time I have to push it on the back wheels only for it to go straight. It would be easy to fold if you didn't have to make sure the wheels were pushed just the right way for it to go completely down. Very disappointed in this stroller and would not recommend purchasing.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Stacy Northway
Title: Awesome
Body: Loved the product
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Sara Miller
Title: value for product
Body: This is our first stroller and we love it! It was a great price and works great for our needs. It's basic, light and has the storage underneath, which is great! He's got a tray for his pacifier and a toy or treat. What more does a baby need?? :)
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Chelsea B.
Title: Great for trips/travel. Not a primary stroller.
Body: The stroller is smaller than I thought. I wanted something for airport travel for a 3yo and she looked snug in there (34th percentile height-43 percentile weight). It did the job for the trip and will hopefully resell fairly easily.The only part I didn't like was the ability to recline the seat back. On our big stroller it's controlled by a squeezed lever and this stroller has a looped bracket that can be difficult to use when the kid is in the stroller-especially when sleep! Also, seat didn't recline far enough back so when she fell asleep she didn't look comfortable at all. If you're using for travel though it was light, fit in the security check conveyor and easy to snap open and close when tsa is rushing you to keep it moving!
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Karen
Title: So lightweight you dont have to dread in and out trips.
Body: Pregnant and cant lift your regular stroller in and out of the car? This is the stroller for you. Its so lightweight you no longer have to skip going into stores bc you cant take getting your heavy stroller in and out of the car yet again for another store trip. This is the stroller for you its so lightweight and easy to fold and unfold seriously...i had a jogging stroller and I'd skip shopping that one last store bc my stroller was too heavy to have to lug out again. I honestly dont even think about the struggle of having to pull this in and out and skipping stores anymore bc its so lightweight its not a burden. My 9 year old son is so glad i got this one bc he was helping me before taking the other stroller out that was so heavy and hes still amazed at how light this one is. If your on light duty or bedrest and need to get a toddler around this is the stroller for you.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kindra
Title: Extremely lightweight
Body: Extremely lightweight! I was shocked! I LOVE this stroller. I definitely recommend it!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Read Girl 55
Title: Great stroller for travel and everyday use
Body: I am a grandma who bought this to use with my one year old granddaughter. Nice and lightweight, easy to fold and comfortable for her. My children borrowed it when they traveled because it is lighter and it worked great. Nice size basked underneath as well.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Decent umbrella stroller
Body: Decent umbrella stroller for the price. We ordered to have for Disney world and keep as an extra stroller at my mother's house in Florida. It worked for us for a few weeks/while traveling... The steering and handling isn't great. I can't imagine it would be good over bumpy or rough sidewalks. My 4 year old toddler fig well in it tho. And it's Nice to have a basket and adult cup holder on top. The kids tray is a nice feature, but it doesn't unhook and swivel so to get the child in and out you have to pick up the child each time. And the child's cup holder is very small, none of our regular water bottles would fit...The handles were a good height for us... The wheels locked at the bottom (a lock for each wheel).
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Lee O'Donnell
Title: Easy stroller
Body: perfect for quick trips
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: LaDonna S Santiago
Title: Light weight easy to fold
Body: Small and light for easy transport. I neede it for my son with is 35 lbs and it’s works.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: tarajean
Title: Please send me a new one
Body: The stroller parent tray is not fitting the bar looks bent
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Yara
Title: Excellent item
Body: Love it, light and easy to use
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Catherine M. Sam
Title: Love it
Body: Very good
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Linda
Title: Arrived on time
Body: Good product 👍🏾👍🏾
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Kayleigh
Title: Strawberry jelly???
Body: *it wouldn’t let me add the pictures but I definitely have pictures of the messed up wheels* The reason why i gave it 3 stars was because it came with this weird looking strawberry jelly (???) on the two back wheels and one of the front wheels was skratched up. I liked the color and size. Its smaller more light weight but it also came with a tray for mom and baby. The basket is long and higher up as other ones ive had hang lower but are shorter. I got rid of my Urbini travel sytem stroller because it was huge and i hated lugging it around. This is a lot better. Im not sure if im doing something wrong but i cant really get it to fold down. The Directions kind of sucked. I wish the pictures would have been different and the wording (but its not that serious). The front wheels were a pain.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: J. Rose
Title: It's ok for the price
Body: I don't like how you cannot raise the handlebars on this stroller. I also find myself kicking the bar when I walk - The space underneath the stroller is pretty small and a standard plastic cup does not fit into the cupholder on top. Not my favorite stroller. I've used it a few times but think I am going to sell it and buy something else.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Anonymous
Title: Disappointed
Body: Nice lightweight stroller *but not suitable for a Newborn* doesn't maneuver well on stone surface
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: D Stringer
Title: Good quality stroller. Very lightweight.
Body: Great for taking our toddler out for an afternoon stroll.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: A. G. Krause
Title: Good Foldable stroller
Body: Very lightweight and reasonable storage underneath considering such a small stroller
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Positive_Reviews
Title: DONT buy this as a warehouse item!!!!
Body: I purchased this through the warehouse deals and upon receiving it, it was a disgusting mess. After unboxing the stroller the trey had what looked like dried vomit from a previous user ? I couldn't believe the condition this was in and that someone had the nerve to actually send / sell this.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: bryan d.
Title: Good
Body: Excelente , the only thing is that the cup holder are very small and doesn’t fit the large baby bottles 🍼
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Purchased and returned 2 of these strollers
Body: We had to return 2 of these strollers because the front wheels on both of them did not touch the ground properly and would not spin from left to right.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Ash
Title: Great buy- convenient
Body: Easy to steer. Lightweight. Still can hold bags. I wouldn't recommend doing this, but when going to the library I was able to put my 4 month old (in his carseat) on top of the seat part (no, it doesn't latch- but if you are careful depending on your seat this will work and not fall with good judgement) So, I had the seat on top with my bags & books on bottom. Great buy.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: sarah
Title: So noticeably good that mine got stolen!
Body: I go all around town on public transport on my own with the little one and after much research i settled on this stroller because it seemed like it would be the easiest to use. I was right, it really is so easy and light. I'm a very weak woman hauling around an over sized baby in one hand and this stroller on the other as I go up and down stairs to the subway and any place with no ramp. takes me seconds to fold and seconds to open. Little one seemed comfortable and so was I. this was the most active couple of weeks Ive had in months, but I guess someone must've noticed how comfy and nice it looked that they stole it! I set it down, folded, and bam! it was gone. Waiting on my next paycheck to order this again, there is no regret at all with buying this one.If you're trying to get back your active life, I highly recommend this stroller.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: AmazonJ
Title: Great!
Body: We bought this to travel with our 22 month-old through the airport and Disneyworld vacation. It is easy to fold, lightweight, yet still has space under the seat to hold the diaper bag and shopping bags. It was durable and comfortable. It was very easy to push and had a smooth ride. The seat folds down for nap time and the sun shield has an extra panel that folds out far enough to actually block the sun. We highly recommend!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Dr. & Mrs. Love
Title: You get what you pay for.
Body: It seems like it's an okay stroller for the price, but the wheels are flimsy and do not maneuver or turn well. It folds up adequately well but you have to make sure the front wheels are oriented correctly or it won't fully fold. The fabric seemed fine. Overall, not bad for the price, but consider spending a bit more.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Brittany T
Title: CANT LOOSEN STRAPS
Body: I'm not sure if I got a defective stroller or not, but if I didnt, I'm not sure how this got rated so well. I cant loosen the straps at all. I went to an event for the first time with it and I literally sat outside my car trying to loosen the straps. After about 20 minutes of a lot of frustration and a crying child, I started to tear the harness apart just so she could fit for the time being. The harness is now a mess and it was still too tight on her. It's like the strap was put on backwards.I know how to use a stroller and this is ridiculous. I'd rather use a $10 stroller from walmart.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Jane Siegismund
Title: Not as I hoped. I should have researched it a little close.
Body: Cup holders are really small. I still have not figured out how to fold up. I wish that the child’s cup holder, snack tray didn’t have to be taken off and on fully to use.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Jax
Title: Marvelous
Body: The stroller is easy to use and glides right along.The bottom storage area is nice and cup holders and along with tray for babyI only gave it 4 stars for folding - no big deal I just have to use two hands.Not heavy at all easy to pick up and put in carJane Posey
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: whowho
Title: Nice compact stroller
Body: Got it as a lightweight stroller for Disney world for our 2 yr old, but it’s so convenient we use it all the time now- much more sturdy than an umbrella stroller but still thin enough that it’s easy to manage in large crowds. It’s a little tough to fold sometimes- the wheels kind of get in the way, but we’ll worth the purchase
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: JNR87
Title: Great
Body: Great
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Title: Has some issues
Body: I got this for my 11 month old. It doesn’t work well for us. The handles are too low for my husband, he’s not that tall. The basked doesn’t fit out diaper bag which is a standard size one, the cup holder for baby don’t fit her bottles or silly cups and the adult holder didn’t hold my drink either. it Is light, easy to fold and moves nice, but all the other issues irate me, so I’ll be getting a different one.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Oscar
Title: Great for everyday use
Body: Love this product
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: bookfiend

Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: seutoniusx
Title: Good, but not great
Body: We had an very similar stroller for our older son that was made by Jeep. It was an amazing stroller. This one? Not so much. The first time we used it the wheel feel off, and my husband had to MacGyver a paper clip to keep the wheel on. It's also SUPER squeaky and there's no barrier in the front of the storage area underneath, so stuff can fly out the front. Pros are that it folds very easily and is very lightweight.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Chelle
Title: It does what it says it will do.
Body: I have a 2 year old an 9 month old and I’m due in a month with our third. I am 5’1 and it’s hard for me to maneuver double strollers. So my family does single strollers and baby wearing. I wanted something just between our big grace single stroller and an umbrella stroller for walks and airports and other events and activities. This is EXACTLY what I was looking for. It isn’t nearly as easy to collapse as I would like but I imagine with time it will get easier.I assembled this by myself with a toddler and an infant crawling all over it while 27 weeks pregnant with more stress from the children than the stroller, which was all things very easy to put together.It is light weight - lighter than my Graco but as you would expect heavier than an umbrella. The tray in the front has been put to good use. We pour gold fish or crackers or other snacks on it for my toddler to munch on while we stroll but the little cup holder is tiny. My daughter primarily drinks from camelbak water bottles and that won’t fit in the tiny circumference of the cup holder on the tray so we just tuck her water by her hip and fill the cup thing with another snack. 😂My biggest complaint is the adult cup tray. It also has tiny little holders. An 80 cent plastic water will fit in there but that’s about it. No worries from me though when we got our first stroller I hated that tray too so I went and found a different one in amazon that I just love. I’ll be switching this one out for that as well.Overall I dig this thing.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Emilie
Title: Love this stroller!
Body: It's a little difficult to fold up but aside from that I LOVE this stroller! It's super lightweight and it feels very sturdy and durable. Not cheaply made but obviously the price tag is a good perk :) for the price point, as far as strollers go, I'd definitely say this one is worth purchasing.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: It is hard to maneuvera it one hand.
Body: I am handicap when I had my stroke. It is easy to take apart. When you are driving with one hand all the time it is hard to manually.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: McPherson Family
Title: Perfect Lightweight Stroller
Body: We bought this for our son when we sold his travel system combo (carseat and stroller combo). It was perfect for what we needed!! Lightweight, easy to fold up, and fits perfectly in his closet to store.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Ohmra3
Title: Quality product and easy assembly.
Body: I love it! Very easy to assemble. The packaging was well secured and revealed few pieces to unpack and were ready to identify. *Bonus* The price was exceptional as there was a discount applied to my order!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: NJH
Title: Wonderful Stroller!
Body: I am a bbsitting grandma and needed a lightweight but sturdy stroller-this is perfect. Great storage on the bottom-nice adjustable straps-easy for me to open and close. It reclines I’d say 3/4 of the way, which is all I need in case she gets sleepy on a walk-you can gently release the back strap to that recline position. The cup holders for the adult are small, so probably will only hold a smallish bottled water but that’s fine-plenty of room in the bottom for a small lunch size cooler and a diaper bag and a purse. It was super easy to put together-did it myself. The shade hood is nice and large and I like the see thru mesh insert so I can keep an eye on her-I read hundreds of reviews about this and others, and am so glad I got this one. I’ve had it a while now and no complaints or issues and use it every day-
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Lightweight, easy to collapse, and extraordinary storage basket!
Body: We took this all the way from Alaska to Spain. Ten flights over and back total, and probably 70+ miles walked in 14 days. This stroller was terrific. The large basket underneath was ideal for toting about the diaper bag, snacks, and anything we bought throughout the day during our long adventures out. The recline on the stroller was perfect for when our toddler fell asleep. I do suggest leaving the top cupholder off when traveling so much however, as it was the first and only thing to disappear during the one of ten gate checks we put it through. I would recommend this to anyone about to travel with a baby/toddler, as we had traveled without a stroller to various states before and this made airports so much easier.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: April Wallace
Title: Great Disney park stroller
Body: Great buy, bought it for an upcoming Disney world trip and totally recommend. It’s very lightweight, easy to fold, and provides enough comfort and storage to have everything you’d need in the parks. We also bought a stroller organizer for extra storage and deeper cup holders. Overall a great buy.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Title: Smaller than expected

The seat doesn’t recline back very far and it just seems like a small seat all together . They also don’t list that the hand bar is low so if you are tall I wouldn’t suggest this , I’m 5’5 and it still feels pretty small.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

My girls (both under three) slept comfortably (took turns - we had another light weight stroller, incomparable to this one!).

By the time I saw them I already put it together and didn't want to deal with return. So I kept it. When my toddler seats in the stroller you can't see it, so it is fine.

La canasta para hechar cosas es super amplia, no le doy las 5 estrellas solo porque el portavaso es muy angosto solo botellas de agua cupieron en el portavasos.

The basket underneath is TINY. I can’t get the diaper bag under the stroller at all. And there’s no good place to hang the diaper bag where it won’t tip the stroller over.Pros: I like the tray. It’s light, easy to fold, and fairly easy to put together. It seems comfortable (my baby always seems happy about riding in it). It’s a great small stroller for the price.

Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Jasmine Halili
Title: NOT one handed fold and lock! Nice lightweight stroller, but disappointing
Body: This stroller had such good reviews, especially as a one handed fold stroller to take to disneyland, so I was pretty disappointed when it proved that it wasnt really a good one handed fold stroller, as folding it down takes some good leverage or 2 hands, and you then still need 2 hands to fold a little strap thing over to lock it closed, which was also disappointing too as it has to be slightly open, not fully folded shut, to lock in place, and so if it get closed a little more for any reason the lock slips right off... I definitely did NOT like the locking mechanism... it was a nice lightweight stroller though for the cost if you dont mind those things... I did though and ended up returning it and getting the chicco mini bravo plus, which is a bit more expensive but so worth it! It has a true one handed fold and stays shut without any other little lock stuff! It worked great for taking my 1 and half year old to disneyland! My recommendation: spend the extra money for the chicco keyfit bravo if you want the true 1 handed fold!
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

I love the toddler tray on the front, it came in very useful while strolling through the airport. Because it’s so lightweight it’s made of cheaper feeling material which isn’t a big deal but the plane workers throw that stuff around and somehow the locking latch got broken. It’s not a big deal and certainly not this companies fault just be warned, it does seem like it could break easily.

Author: alexa
Title: Good for the money
Body: I needed a quick to fold, and open stroller that was practical. All to often you get a light weight stroller and once you put a kid in it, it's hard to push and move. This isnt the case with this stroller. It's easy to push and move around on all types of surfaces. The folding isn't as easy as some of the other one hand fold strollers I've used before but it makes up for it with how easy it is to push. I picked this one because it came with a snack tray for toddlers and adults. The snack tray for adults isn't the best you can fit a plastic water bottle from the store in it and nothing larger but the kids tray is perfect for small snacks. I recommend this stroller for value and ease of pushing. Sometimes it takesme two trys to fold it but for the price I can't complain. I would also recommend the darker color I got the light grey and it stains easily.
Styles: Color: Slate Grey (Wheel Color May Vary)

Author: Meagan
Title: Lightweight

Author: Carol
Title: Best stroller ever. Great value.
Body: Was surprised at the quality for $50. Bought from Amazon Warehouse. The box was damaged, but the stroller was brand new, still wrapped in cellophane with all the papers.It's the best stroller I've owned. Has the see through hood so I can see the baby while pushing. Very lightweight. I love the ergonomic tilted handles that are covered with squishy foam. So easy on the hands. There's a tray at the back for you and a tray across the front for baby. I like the new strap system. Holds baby in place securely without being binding. When you fold the stroller up, it still stands, instead of falling over on the floor. This makes it easier to stow against the wall out of the way.Very pleased with the stroller.
Styles: Color: Fire Red (Wheel Color May Vary)

Body: Lightweight. Cup holders do not hold sippi cups. They are too small. No seat support. Child Legs dangle no foot support for small toddlers. Used for quick trips only. Not what I was hoping for.

Was Easy assemble, unfortunately seems cheaper than most things made by this brand

Author: Nini
Title: Impressed but a few suggestions to make it better.
Body: This stroller looks better in person than pictures.It is lightweight.There are 2 reasons why it was returned.1. Back seat needs more padding.2. The canopy wasn’t long Enough and the peekaboo window is a piece of black mesh permanently open.It was a little uncomfortable for my baby for the mentioned reasons. I didn’t mind the padding too much because I could buy a pad liner but the Peekaboo window was a deal breaker, other than that perfect!

Author: Nicole Vazquez
Title: Great!
